mapper.select: select * from tbl_participate where memberno = #{memberno} and routeno=#{routeno}
mapper.update: update tbl_participate set score = #{score}, stage = #{stage}, lastDate = now() where participateno = #{participateno}
update tbl_participate set score = #{score}, lastDate = now(), finish = true where participateno = #{participateno}
mapper.select: select R.* from (select distinct routeno from tbl_participate where memberno = #{memberno} AND finish = true) rno, tbl_route AS R where rno.routeno = R.routeno

select P.participateno, R.routename ,A.username,P.routeno, P.memberno, P.score,P.participateDate,P.lastDate from tbl_participate AS P,tbl_route AS R , tbl_admin AS A where P.routeno = R.routeno AND R.adminno = A.adminno AND P.memberno = #{memberno} AND P.routeno = #{routeno} AND P.finish = true order by lastDate desc Limit #{page},1
